titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology in the One Hundred Twelfth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: 2/17/2011--Introduced. Provides amounts for expenses of the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology for the 112th Congress.
